text:
The generator produces rectangles and circle with attributes of type
length and negative values, which is invalid SVG.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
Modified SVGRectangle and SVGCircle to account for degenerate cases on
Rectangle2D and Ellipse2D. This caused another bug (on 0 width/height handling
in <rect> and <circle>) to be fixed in the Bridge.
Created a regression test: 
test-resources/org/apache/batik/svggen/NegativeLengths.java.
